name: NuclearCell
description:
Description

Year 2102, nuclear power has been integrated into household electronics. By charging it once, a battery can hold its charge for a life time. However, due to the complex design, nuclear powered batteries must be swiftly initialized before they reach an unstable low power state.

You have been assigned to factory initialize these devices. Good luck!

Controls

Space = Select cables / Speed up

A, D = Move cables

Mouse Movement/Click = Drag power bricks

Mouse Movement/Click = Click on devices to zoom in

Attribution

Made in conjunction with my lovely colleague PingXing.
